defines.rdfs:label: is related to a keyword Concept
defines.rdfs:comment: subject-document is in a semantic relation with the object-keyword

defines.rdfs:label: is related to a space mission or a space launch
defines.rdfs:comment: subject-document is historically or technically related to a space mission

defines.rdfs:label: is an document related to an event
defines.rdfs:comment: subject-document is semantically related with an event or happening

defines.rdfs:label: is a document related to a celestial body named
defines.rdfs:comment: subject-document is semantically related to a celestial body

defines.rdfs:label: is a mission that carries the payload named
defines.rdfs:comment: subject-document is a mission or a launch carrying the object-document

defines.rdfs:label: is a DBpedia document with an high level of semantical relation with
defines.rdfs:comment: a DBpedia document highly semantically related to another of the same kind

defines.rdfs:label: NASA-STI keyword
defines.rdfs:comment: a keyword representing a Concept in the NASA-STI taxonomy

defines.rdfs:label: data taken from a DBpedia page
defines.rdfs:comment: a document representing a wikipedia page information

defines.rdfs:label: a space launch that took place somewhen in the past
defines.rdfs:comment: a document representing a space launch taken from wikipedia page

defines.rdfs:label: a space mission
defines.rdfs:comment: a document representing a space mission from Chronos legacy

defines.rdfs:label: an event or happening related with a space mission
defines.rdfs:comment: a document representing an event or happening from Chronos legacy

defines.rdfs:label: a natural satellite
defines.rdfs:comment: a document representing a natural satellite

defines.rdfs:label: a celestial body
defines.rdfs:comment: a document representing a generic celestial body

defines.rdfs:label: a sensor or an instrument from the sensors' taxonomy
defines.rdfs:comment: a document representing a detector or sensor, see Sensor Ontology

defines.rdfs:label: can be queried as a member of this group
defines.rdfs:comment: a string assigning the document to a set or a Class in the datastore, useful for fast querying
